function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exponential growth of published works between 2017 and 2020","Impact":"Overwhelming amount of information to process, potential inclusion of non-relevant data","Mitigation":"Implementation of advanced text mining software to filter non-relevant repeated words","Technologies":"Text mining software like VOSviewer","People":"Researchers, scholars, and readers looking for relevant information","Owner":"Research teams, academic institutions, and publishers"},{"Description":"Inclusion of papers not relevant to COVID-19 challenges","Impact":"Dilution of valuable information with irrelevant data","Mitigation":"Strictly filtering out papers that do not relate to the challenges during and due to COVID-19","Technologies":"Text mining software, keyword filters","People":"Research teams, academic institutions, and publishers","Owner":"Research teams, academic institutions, and publishers"},{"Description":"Reading and analyzing a large set of manuscripts","Impact":"Time-consuming and resource-intensive process","Mitigation":"Development of efficient process and tools for detailed analysis, possibly leveraging automation","Technologies":"Data analysis software, automation tools","People":"Researchers, scholars, and analysts","Owner":"Research teams, academic institutions"}]}
